snippet: A Chicago man was sentenced on Tuesday to nearly 10 years in prison for plotting to attend a training camp in Somalia with the goal of becoming a suicide bomber for Al Qaeda and another terrorist group, al-Shabab.
lead_paragraph: A Chicago man was sentenced on Tuesday to nearly 10 years in prison for plotting to attend a training camp in Somalia with the goal of becoming a suicide bomber for Al Qaeda and another terrorist group, al-Shabab.

headline.seo: Chicago Man Is Sentenced in Terrorism Case
